text: Kateekal Sankaranarayanan (15 October 1932 - 24 April 2022) was an Indian politician. He was the Governor of Maharashtra from 2010 to 2014. He also was the Governor of Nagaland and Jharkhand. He was a member of the Indian National Congress."K Sankaranarayanan is new Nagaland Governor" , Times of India, 19 January 2007. He was born in Palakkad, India. Sankaranarayanan died on 24 April 2022 at his home in Palakkad from problems caused by a stroke, aged 89.Veteran Congress leader K. Sankaranarayanan passes away aged 89Former Governor and Congress Convener K Sankara Narayanan has passed away ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Governors of Arunachal Pradesh Category:Governors of Assam Category:Governors of Goa Category:Governors of Jharkhand Category:Governors of Maharashtra Category:Governors of Nagaland Category:Deaths from stroke
title: K. Sankaranarayanan
